name: Keeper Registrar
description: This contract allows to register keeper nodes and to assign them to a specific job.

eventDecorators.name: Registration requested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a keeper node requests to be registered.

parameterDecorators.name: Hash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the registration request.

parameterDecorators.name: Name
parameterDecorators.description: Name of Upkeep.

parameterDecorators.name: Encrypted email
parameterDecorators.description: Encrypted email of the node that requested to be registered.

parameterDecorators.name: Upkeep contract
parameterDecorators.description: Address of Keepers-compatible contract that will be automated.

parameterDecorators.name: Gas limit
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum amount of gas that will be used to execute your function on-chain.

parameterDecorators.name: Admin address
parameterDecorators.description: Address for Upkeep administrator. Upkeep administrator can fund contract.

parameterDecorators.name: Check data
parameterDecorators.description: ABI-encoded fixed and specified at Upkeep registration and used in every checkUpkeep. Can be empty (0x).

parameterDecorators.name: Amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of LINK (in Wei) to fund your Upkeep. The minimum amount is 0.1 LINK. To fund 0.1 LINK please set this to 100000000000000000.

parameterDecorators.name: Source
parameterDecorators.description: Not in use in programmatic registration. Please specify with 0.

eventDecorators.name: Registration approved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a keeper node is approved and assigned an upkeep ID.

parameterDecorators.name: Hash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the registration request.

parameterDecorators.name: Display name
parameterDecorators.description: Display name of the keeper.

parameterDecorators.name: Upkeep ID
parameterDecorators.description: Assigned ID for the keeper's upkeep.

eventDecorators.name: Registration rejected
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a keeper node's registration request is rejected.

parameterDecorators.name: Hash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the registration request.

eventDecorators.name: Auto approve allowed sender set
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the allowed sender for auto approval is set.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the allowed sender for auto approval.

parameterDecorators.name: Allowed
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the sender is allowed for auto approval or not.

eventDecorators.name: Config changed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the configuration for the upkeep is changed.

parameterDecorators.name: Auto approve config type
parameterDecorators.description: Type of auto approve configuration.

parameters.name: ENABLED_SENDER_ALLOWLIST
parameters.description: Auto approve registration requests if the sender is in the allowlist.

parameterDecorators.name: Auto approve max allowed
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum number of nodes to auto approve.

parameterDecorators.name: Keeper registry
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the keeper registry contract.

parameterDecorators.name: Min LINK juels
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum amount of LINK required to fund the upkeep.

constructorDecorators.name: Constructor
constructorDecorators.description: Deploys the contract with the provided LINK address, auto approve config type, auto approve max allowed, keeper registry, and minimum LINK juels.

parameterDecorators.name: LINK address
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the LINK token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: Auto approve config type
parameterDecorators.description: The type of auto approve configuration.

parameters.name: ENABLED_SENDER_ALLOWLIST
parameters.description: Auto approve registration requests if the sender is in the allowlist.

parameterDecorators.name: Auto approve max allowed
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum number of auto approvals allowed.

parameterDecorators.name: Keeper registry
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the Keeper Registry contract.

parameterDecorators.name: Min LINK juels
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum amount of LINK (in juels) required for an upkeep registration.

functionDecorators.name: Register
functionDecorators.description: Registers a keeper node with the provided display name, URL, check data, and minimum LINK juels.

parameterDecorators.name: Name
parameterDecorators.description: Name of the upkeep to be registered

parameterDecorators.name: Encrypted email
parameterDecorators.description: Email address of upkeep contact

parameterDecorators.name: Upkeep contract
parameterDecorators.description: Address to perform upkeep on.

parameterDecorators.name: Gas limit
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of gas to provide the target contract when performing upkeep.

parameterDecorators.name: Admin address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to cancel upkeep and withdraw remaining funds.

parameterDecorators.name: Check data
parameterDecorators.description: Data passed to the contract when checking for upkeep.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount
parameterDecorators.description: Quantity of LINK upkeep is funded with (specified in Juels).

parameterDecorators.name: Source
parameterDecorators.description: Application sending this request.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the sender making the request.

functionDecorators.name: Approve
functionDecorators.description: Approves a pending upkeep registration request.

parameterDecorators.name: Name
parameterDecorators.description: Name of the upkeep being approved.

parameterDecorators.name: Upkeep contract
parameterDecorators.description: Address to perform upkeep on.

parameterDecorators.name: Gas limit
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of gas to provide the target contract when performing upkeep.

parameterDecorators.name: Admin address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to cancel upkeep and withdraw remaining funds.

parameterDecorators.name: Check data
parameterDecorators.description: Data passed to the contract when checking for upkeep.

parameterDecorators.name: Hash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the upkeep registration request to approve.

functionDecorators.name: Cancel
functionDecorators.description: Cancels a pending upkeep registration request and refunds the LINK balance.

parameterDecorators.name: Hash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the registration request to cancel.

functionDecorators.name: Set Registration Config
functionDecorators.description: Updates the registration configuration for the Keeper registry

parameterDecorators.name: Auto Approve Type
parameterDecorators.description: Type of auto approval for upkeeps

parameterDecorators.name: Auto Approve Max Allowed
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum number of auto approved upkeeps

parameters.name: ENABLED_SENDER_ALLOWLIST
parameters.description: Auto approve registration requests if the sender is in the allowlist.

parameterDecorators.name: Keeper Registry
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the Keeper registry contract

parameterDecorators.name: Min LINK Juels
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum amount of LINK tokens required for upkeeps

functionDecorators.name: Set Auto Approve Allowed Sender
functionDecorators.description: Sets the auto approve allowed status for the specified sender address.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the sender for which to set the auto approve allowed status.

parameterDecorators.name: Allowed
parameterDecorators.description: True if senderAddress needs to be added to allowlist, false if needs to be removed.

functionDecorators.name: getAutoApproveAllowedSender
functionDecorators.description: Read the allowlist status of a sender address.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to read the allowlist status for.

returnDecorators.name: Is allowed
returnDecorators.description: Whether the sender is allowed for auto-approvals.

parameters.name: ENABLED_SENDER_ALLOWLIST
parameters.description: Auto approve registration requests if the sender is in the allowlist.

returnDecorators.name: Auto Approve Max Allowed
returnDecorators.description: The maximum number of auto-approvals allowed.

returnDecorators.name: Approved Count
returnDecorators.description: The number of approved upkeep registrations.

returnDecorators.name: Keeper Registry
returnDecorators.description: The address of the keeper registry.

returnDecorators.name: Min LINK Juels
returnDecorators.description: The minimum amount of LINK required to register upkeep.

functionDecorators.name: Get Pending Request
functionDecorators.description: Gets the admin address and the current balance of a registration request.

parameterDecorators.name: Hash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the registration request.

returnDecorators.name: Admin
returnDecorators.description: Admin address of the registration request.

returnDecorators.name: Balance
returnDecorators.description: Current balance of the registration request (in Juels).
